mapper.select:
select dsa.* from DATA_SOURCE_ACCESS dsa
left join TEAM t on t.id =dsa.ACCESS_OBJECT_ID and dsa.ACCESS_OBJECT_TYPE = 'TEAM' left join DBHUB_USER du on du.ID=dsa.ACCESS_OBJECT_ID and dsa.ACCESS_OBJECT_TYPE = 'USER'
and dsa.DATA_SOURCE_ID = #{dataSourceId}
and (t.CODE like concat('%',#{searchKey},'%') or t.NAME like concat('%',#{searchKey},'%') or du.USER_NAME like concat('%',#{searchKey},'%') or du.NICK_NAME like concat('%',#{searchKey},'%') or du.EMAIL like concat('%',#{searchKey},'%'))
